channel.title: NestHub on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in NestHub on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Show grass on Google Nest Hub
item.description: I bought the Pixel 4 and received the Google Nest Hub. It seems to be usable as a digital photo frame. Since I'm sorry, I will display the grass image on GitHub. Google Nest Hub settings Immediately after purchase, Nest Hub will display an art gallery prepared by Google. Change this to a setting that allows you to view your favorite image. Launch the Google Home app on your iOS or Android device If you bought Nest Hub, you should have installed it Go to Nest Hub> Photo Frame Change the display image setting to Google Photos Change “Personal Photo Organize” setting to “Real-time shared albums only” Without this setting, GitHub grass images, etc.
